item.description:
IMPORTANT UPDATE:

Because it's going to be so hot on Saturday, the church has moved us into an air-conditioned classroom down the hall from the big room where we usually meet. If necessary, we can spill over into the classroom next door (also air-conditioned).

So this would be a good Meetup to be selective about what you bring. Also, let's forget about the Free Stuff and Sale tables this time so that we don't have to haul tables around. See you Saturday!

Other details:

Pamela will lead us in a hands-on, real-time creative exercise called "Found Poetry." Don't worry--you don't have to write anything, all materials will be provided and you'll end up with some truly cool ATCs. We've had a lot of fun with this in the past, so be sure to join us for inspiration and fun.

Swap themes this month:
--Favorite artist (homage to or done in that artist's style)
--Technique swap: Origami (based on June workshop by Kate, but other folded cards or embellishments are fine).

Note that your organizer won't arrive until 12:30 and we won't be through setting up until about 1 p.m. If you'd like to help set up (which will be much appreciated), please arrive between 12:30 and 1. If you arrive later, please plan to help us clean up (also much appreciated).
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the church's Fellowship Hall, just off the parking lot near the back of the building

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: UPDATED: July Meetup--Note 12:30 p.m. start time--and, yes, we have A/C!
